scripts.install:all: cd front && npm install && cd ../back && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd front && npm run dev" "cd back && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd front && npm run preview" "cd back && npm run start"
scripts.build: cd front && npm run build && cd ../back && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:front && npm run lint:back
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:front:fix && npm run lint:back:fix
